10.eng-name: The Book of Leading the Prayer (Al-Imamah)

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Abu Sa'eed that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) saw that his companions tended to stand in the rear, so he said:"Come forward and follow me, and let those who are behind you follow your lead. If people continue to lag behind, Allah, the Mighty and Sublime, will put them back

chapter.eng-name: Following those who are following the Imam
